subject: Snowboarding
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Shaun White, the snowboarder and skateboarder, is looking forward to the 2014 Olympics, which will include a new event: slopestyle snowboarding.
snippet: Shaun White, the snowboarder and skateboarder, is looking forward to the 2014 Olympics, which will include a new event: slopestyle snowboarding.
